name: Krascent

overview:

* Web Maintenance & Support
* Web Marketing
* Content Management
* Application Development
* E-commerce Services
* Software Maintenance

Krascent is a diversified design and global software development company that gives technological solutions to business enterprises around the world. Krascent has proven expertise in encompassing low cost, but high quality and reliable software solutions and services in areas like IT consulting, web development and business applications including ecommerce, e-learning, finance, manufacturing, content management and many other business systems.

Krascent has achieved the status of a reputed software development service provider by gaining immense experience in undertaking and implementing a wide range of projects for reputed organizations and firms across the world with great success. The state-of-the-art infrastructure accentuated with the latest technological tools at Krascent helps in working out intelligent, quick and cost cutting software solutions for assorted business enterprises.

Krascent firmly believes in directing the clients to increase their business output through the application of the latest technical tools and a careful handling of the changing dynamics of offshore software development. Krascent delivers quality service that serves as an eye opener for the customers to conduct business more creatively and effectively. We balance project duration and product development efforts to suit your business needs.
